Author: Manjunath Rao G
Summary: This script will fetch information of certain Azure operation against Azure resources and create a CSV file. Specifically, this script will create a CSV file that contains a list of Azure operations that de-allocates an Azure virtual machine.You may alter the IF condition stateme
Title: Fetch details of Azure virtual machine de-allocate operation
UserTags: Microsoft Azure, Windows Azure Virtual Machines, Windows Azure PowerShell
